name: FanimationCeilingFan
0:
”"Alexa, turn on bedroom fan."”
”"Alexa, set the living room fan to 50%."”
”"Alexa, dim kitchen light to 60%."”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is supporting to the Fanimation Ceiling Fan WiFi Remote Control with part number 'WFR****'. The fan speed control and lighting on/off dimming. Create an account on 'fanSync WIFI' app or link to an existing Fanimation account. 

Control your Fanimation Ceiling fans. Here are some examples to get started:
"Alexa, turn on bedroom fan."
"Alexa, turn off the living room fan."
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light."
"Alexa, turn off office light."
"Alexa, set the living room fan to 50%."
"Alexa, dim kitchen light to 60%."
